summary: Small tool that allows you to change the location that skyrim loads and saves your game saves too.
descriptionHtml:
This tool allows you to change where your skyrim saves are saved and loaded from, quickly and easily, simply input the path you want your skyrim saves to be loaded from and click change.

========= How To ===========
1)Download Main File
2)Extract the "SGSLC" folder
3)Run untility as admin (it won't work otherwise).
4)Follow the instructions in the utility very carefully.

========= NOTICE ===========
1) You must backup your skyrim saves before using this program or you will lose them.
2) You must run this program as an admin or the path will not change.
3) Have fun playing skyrim, and don't forget to endorse.
4) If you have suggestions to improve the program, just pm me.

Thanks,
IndecentAct.
author: IndecentAct
